issue.title: REST::DELETE collides with DELETE defined in winnt.h

content.html:
I think the only problem is in REST.cc, since it includes curl/curl.h. The following is a workaround:

diff -r 535f5d8868f7 src/REST.cc
--- a/src/REST.cc   Wed Jan 17 13:35:39 2018 -0800
+++ b/src/REST.cc   Wed Jan 17 13:51:59 2018 -0800
@@ -16,6 +16,7 @@
 */

 #include <curl/curl.h>
+#undef DELETE
 #include <cstring>
 #include <iostream>
 #include <string>
